messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Digest Number 3792
messages.msgSnippet:
... This is precisely where I am.  I am constantly vascilating between feeling
absolutely confident in my choice to being petrified that I am somehow
failing
messages.messageBody:
> I have to remind myself that I'm not unschooling to prove anything to
anyone, but because I believe it's right for my kids.

This is precisely where I am. I am constantly vascilating between feeling
absolutely confident in my choice to being petrified that I am somehow
failing my children. The closer we get to high school (both turning 13 this
year), the more I panic. I have to bolster myself and remind myself that I
made an educated decision to unschool because I believe in my heart that
this is the best choice for my children.

Peace,
Sarah
Homeschooling mama to Amanda 12 1/2, and Ashleigh 12 1/2



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
